iata:invoiceFootTotalPackagelNumber.description: Identifies the number of logistics unit that are being described.

iata:invoiceFootTotalNetWeight.description: Total goods net weight (sum of package net weight)

iata:invoiceFootTotalGrossWeight.description: Total goods gross weight (sum of package gross weight) including packaging

iata:invoiceFootTotalLineCount.description: Total number of line items in the invoice

iata:invoiceFootTotalChargesAmount.description: Total Charges Amount (sum of the charge type amounts).

iata:invoiceFootTotalDiscountAmount.description: Total Rebate Amount (sum of Discount Amount plus sum of Discount Amount).

iata:invoiceFootTotalTaxAmount.description: Total Duty/Tax/Fee Amount holds the total amount of Duty/Tax/Fee in the Invoice Currency. This item could be mandatory depending of the country's national requirements

iata:invoiceFootTotalAmountReceivableInT.description: Specifies in letter the Net amount plus tax plus total charges amount minus Total Rebate Amount.

iata:invoiceFootTotalTaxAmount.description: Duty/Tax/Fee Amount holds the Duty/Tax/Fee amount in the Invoice currency.

iata:invoiceFootTotalTaxType.description: Duty/Tax/Fee Type identifies the type of the Duty/Tax/Fee (ValueAddedTax, GoodsAndServicesTax). From the Code List.

iata:invoiceFootTotalTaxPercent.description: Duty/Tax/Fee Percent holds the Duty/Tax/Fee rate as a percentage (e.g 19.6).

iata:invoiceFootTotalTaxableAmount.description: Amount subject to Duty/Tax/Fee is the Net amount - the amount that is subject to Duty/Tax/Feetaxed in the invoice currency.

iata:invoiceFootTotalTaxCategory.description: Duty/Tax/Fee Category indicates the category of the tax (e.g. StandardRate, Exempt from Tax) and, by implication, the rate that applies. The actual percentage is dependent on the tax jurisdiction.

iata:invoiceFootTotalTaxExemptCode.description: Exempt Code is used to communicate the reason that a product is exempt from Duty/Tax/Fee

iata:invoiceFootTotalTaxDescription.description: Describes the function/purpose of the Duty/Tax/Fee element.

iata:invoiceFootTotalTaxFunction.description: Duty/Tax/Fee Function indicates the function/purpose of the Duty/Tax/Fee element.

iata:invoiceFootTotalPackingChargesBreak.description: CALCULATED FIELD: total of PKG invoiceLineType

iata:invoiceFootTotalFreightChargesBreak.description: CALCULATED FIELD: total of FRT invoiceLineType

iata:invoiceFootTotalInsuranceChargesBre.description: CALCULATED FIELD: total of INS invoiceLineType

iata:invoiceFootAvailabilityDateTime.description: date and time of availability of goods for pickup at origin

iata:invoiceFootDeliveryDateTime.description: The date at which the delivery is scheduled to take place. Format is YYYYMMDD.

iata:invoiceFootNote.description: Contains a summary level text note. Free text

iata:invoiceFootCustomsReferenceNumber.description: Unique identification number assigned by the Customs to the Invoice (e.g. UCR)
